name: First Up
description:
In "First Up," you'll need to reach your goal by using your parkour skills, unique character abilities, and shared auxiliary devices. Your adversaries are not just dynamic obstacles, each requiring a special approach and tactics, but also other players who use their skills and weapons to knock you off course.

Features:

Unique characters with their own appearances, skills, and emotions.
Diverse maps with their own themes, unique obstacles, and secrets.
Active and passive skills. Each character can be assigned one active and one passive skill.
Auxiliary devices, such as a grappling hook and a platform-shooting cannon.
Emotions to support or tease your friends during the game.
